alert.note: Alert for Greenup (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 10:12AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Greenup, west central Gallia, Jackson and northwestern Lawrence Counties through 1045 AM EST... At 1011 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rosemount, or near Portsmouth, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, Jackson, Wellston, Oak Hill, New Boston, Letitia, Franklin Furnace, Gallia, Vernon, Waterloo, South Shore, Coalton, Mabee, Sciotoville, Petersburg, Grays Branch, Byer and South Portsmouth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
